author: pipermerriam
content: Anyone got any references you can point me to that specify something in a protocol that involves bit packing.  I'm struggling with notation.  I'm encoding paths into a binary tree.  Since the paths tend to be sequential they tend to share most of their prefix bits so the scheme includes deduplication of these prefix bits.  Current poorly written spec is here for reference: https://notes.ethereum.org/oUJE4ZX2Q6eMOgEMiQPkpQ?both#Path-Serialization
